attributes.action: lift jack tweedy's curfew for his and jade's wedding night
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: the poor woman is dying and everyone deserves a wedding night.  time is not on her side, she cannot wait for a future date.  please show some compassion for just one night.

rejection.details: Jack Straw made a decision on this case.
reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
